text: 'iina allh- wahdah la ghyrh- yaelam mataa taqum alsae? wahu aladhi yunazil almatar min alshab, la yuqadar ealaa dhlk ahd ghyrh, wayaelam ma fi 'arham al'inath, wayaelam ma tksbh kulu nafs fi ghdha, wama taelam nafs bay 'ard tmwt. bal allah taealaa hu almukhtasi bieilm dhlk jmyeh. 'iina allah ealim khabir muhit balzwahr walbwatn, la yakhfaa ealayh shay' mnha
